data.text: Munna nnottuniya Nateofilo,
Aalhempe thoko chenre ihu wo weewa attu yoonechenshe ni anamitheko o nenno nlhove nno toka machokholhelho aya.
Paahi etu, Munna Nateofilo, ukhalhawaya kihowehaweha wo ikekhiaye chittu chonkhaye rata chene toka khalhayi, kihoona vahorera etu ulhepa wo nlhatu winyu,
ni inyu nchuwelhe mwaanene ikeekhene yiituchihiye inyu.
Naherode vaari aya amwene o Uyudea, ahawo anamilhohi eehaniya Azakariya, o nlhoko wa opochera ishaani eehaniya Naabiya. Ahanu aya Azakariya eehaniya Naelisabeti, o nihimo na anamilhohi Naharuni.
Onkhaye elhi ayo aari attu aapanga chittu cho ikekhiaye mmiholho wa Nlhuku, attwaraka iphiro cho malhehero ni ikano cha Athithi wo uhikhalha ni nlhatu wo ukhuwachiya.
Nansho yaari ahirina ashaana ukhalhawaya Naelisabeti yaari o uhiyara, ni ayo onkhaye ayo aari anoolhuvanlhe chinene.
Nihuku nimoka Azakariya yaari avaraka ntheko aya wo upochera ishaani Unupani wa Nlhuku.
Yaari vaathanlhiye aya thoko chaari aya chipangiyaka ni opochera ishaani, urwaa uutusherani ubani umadhubahuni. Paahi etu nkayaarwaa u Inupa ya Athithi.
Attu akina yaari vathe awehereraka anlhapelhaka Nlhuku ubani vaatusheriya aya.
Nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi nkawaakhumelhelha mpaani mmo, nkaweemelha wiimonono wo madhubahu mwaatusheriya ubani.
Azakariya vonne aya nnepa uyo nkayaathukumelha ni woova chinene.
Nansho nnepa wo wiirimu nkaweera, “Azakariya, nhoove! Nlhuku heewa ulhapelha winyu, ni ahanu inyu Naelisabeti anonnyara mwaana mwanlhopwana. Mmweeke mwaamwiihana nchina nawe Yohana.
Kihochuwelha wiira nnowa mwaateelhiya chinene, ni attu enchi akina anowa uteelhiya chiicho vanohalha awe uyaria!
Nowa ukhalha ntu mulhupalhe mmiholho wa Athithi. Khanowa aawuria idivai mena utheka uriwoothe. Toka vanohalha awe uyaria ni anumwanawe noowa aachariya Iphumu ya Nlhuku,
ni weewananiha rata attu enchi o Israeli ni waapiiha wa Athithi ri Nlhuku aya.

Nowa waaholhelha Athithi, wo machiri ni Iphumu thoko ya Naeliya. Noowa weewananiha manyanaangoro ni achishaana aya, nowa urukunusha mirima cha attu o itiyamaru wiira avire iphiro choombone, ni weesha tayari attu a Atithi.”
Azakariya nkaakhulha nnepa wo wiirimu eeraka, “Kinohalha uchuwelha chani yayo malhove ayo? Mii kihoolhuvalha ni ahanu aka chiicho ahoolhuvalha.”
Nnepa wo wiirimu nkawaakhulha, “Mii kinoolhumacha va phi Gabrieli kineemelha mmiholho wa Nlhuku, kirumme uwa uhimeriani yoyo nttenga wo urera uyo.

Nansho ukhalhawaya khanrumelhenlhe nttenga aka, unowa utimira waayaka. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, nnottukiya malhaku inyu, nnookhalha chiicho wo uhulhumacha mpaka nihuku vanohalha aya utimira malheheriyo aka alha.”
Yeyo ikatema iyo attu yaari yaawehereraka Azakariya uno ashangaka chani woonaka ahothepa ulhokelha chinene u Inupa ya Nlhuku mmo.
Vaakhumme aya vathe, khooria wulhumacha, paahi attu nkayaachuwelha wiira ahoona ithikineha vaari aya u Inupa ya Nlhuku. Yaari athoonyaka wo mathatha.
Ikatema aya yo uvara ntheko wo upochera ishaani Unupani wa Nlhuku vaamanlhe aya, Azakariya nkayaahokolhia uwani.
Baada yo uvira mahuku, ahanu aya, Naelisabeti nkayaarupalha irukulhu. Nkayeettelha mpaani mieri nthanu.
Nkayoolhumacha yiiraka, “Athithi ahokuupuwelha vano, ahothamiha ishoni yoona aka mwaattuni!”
Mweri wo sita wo iweyi i Naelisabeti Nlhuku nkanruma nnepa wo wiirimu Gabrieli arwee iwani wi ilhapo yo Ugalilaya yeehaniya Nazareti.
Arweehe wowo nttenga wa mwalhi mmoka aavekiye ni ntu mmoka o iyari ya Adaudi nchina nawe Yusufu. Mwalhi aarweehelhiya nttenga uyo eehaniya Mariamu.
Nnepa nkawaaphiya wa Amariamu nkaweera, “Mpuha ukhalhe ni inyu! Athithi ari ni inyu, nhovahiya nnema mulhupalhe!”
Amariamu veewilhe aya yayo malhove ayo nkayaathemwa chinene, nkayaashanga wo uhichuwelha maana o yayo malhove ayo.
Nnepa wo wiirimu nkaweera, “Amariamu, nhoove, Nlhuku hoovahani nnema.
Nnoorupalha iweyi ni unnyara mwaana mwanlhopwana, nnohalha inyu umwiihana nchina nawe Yesu.
Yoyo nowa wiihaniya Mwaana a Nlhuku Mulhupalhe, noovahiya ihiche yo imwene thoko apwiiya awe Adaudi chenre aya,
ni uwa ukhalha mwene aya iyari i Nayakhobo mahuku o uhimalha, umwene wawe khunowa waamalha!”
Amariamu nkaakhulha nnepa wo wiirimu, “Mii ki mwalhi kihinaatameriya. Inohalha wiiria chani etu?”
Nnepa wo wiirimu nkawaakhulha, “Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowuukhuruwelhani, ni ikuru ya Nlhuku inowa ukhunelhani. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mwaana ntakatifu nowa wiihaniya Mwaana a Nlhuku.
Moopuwelheke tho alhoko inyu Naelisabeti, Yayo yeeriya wiira khannyara, nansho vano ari veruttuni iweyi yo mieri sita, ni wulhuvalha waya.
Khiiwo ihinooria wa Nlhuku.”
Amariamu nkayeera, “Mii, karumiya a Athithi, yiirieke etu thoko chinre inyu wo wulhumacha.” Nnepa uyo nkawaathama.
Mahuku vaavinre aya, Amariamu wo uhipicha nkayaarwaa mpaka iwani yo umiakoni Uyudea.
Aarweelhe mpaka uwani wa Azakariya ni waashikuria Naelisabeti.
Naelisabeti veewilhe aya Amariamu aashikuriaka, mwaana mwankani nkaathuphathupha munthunkwani mwaya. Naelisabeti nkayaachariya Iphumu ya Nlhuku
nkayoolhumacha akhuwelhaka wiira, “Nhovahiya ibarakha waapwaha manyopani onkhaye, ni mwaana inyu nohalha uyaria hovahiya nnema!
Ki mpani mii mpaka alha akhumelhelhe uwannyaka, anumwanaya Athithi akeetelhelhe?
Kinouhimeriani wiira, veewilhe aka tu nlhove ninyu, mwaana mwankani hothupha munthunkwani mwaka ateelhiyaka.
Nhoreeriya inyu mwaarumelhenlhe wiira anowa aatimira malhove o nttenga wa Athithi ahimeriye inyu!”
Amariamu nkayeera,
nrima aka uhoteelhiya ukhalhawaya Nlhuku phi moopolhi aka,
ukhalhawaya hokuupuwelha, mii karumiya kihiphwanelhiye!
ukhalhawaya Nlhuku o ikuru yulhupalhe hokipangelha chittu chulhupalhe.
uchokholha iyari imoka mpaka iyari chikina
Ahopanga mitheko chulhupalhe wo moono aya wo machiri
Haakurushacha mamwene aholhelhi vahicheni waya,
Haawoniha chittu choombone attu awolhiye ithalha,
Hotimiriha malhehano aapannge awe ni manyaapwiiya ihu,
Hoopuwelha ikiriri awe wa Aburahimu
Amariamu nkayaalhokelha mieri miraru u Naelisabeti nkayaahokolhia uwani.
Nkawaaya wa Naelisabeti wiithaphulha, nkayannyara mwaana mwanlhopwana.
Amwaatamana aya vamoka ni ashilhoko aya nkayeewa Athithi chinre awe wo woonelha ikiriri, nkawaattapelhelhiya vamoka.
Mwaana vaapihilhe nihuku no nane, nkaarwehiya uwiinelhiyani unyawo, ni urwaa ummahani nchina na athumwane Zakariya.
Nansho anumwane nkayeera, “Mena! Nchina nawe Yohana.”
Attu nkayeera, “Nansho woonaka khaawo nlhoko inyu neehaniya chiicho!”
Paahi etu, nkayaathoonya waakoha athumwane wiira ehaniyeke nchina naani.
Azakariya nkayaavekelha wiira avahiye ikibau alhepe, nkayaalhepa wiira, “Nchina nawe Yohana.” Attu onkhaye nkayaashangacha!
Ni vavawo Azakariya nkayaattukuwa malhaku ni nlhimi naya, nkayoolhumacha tho, nkaachokholha untotopelha Nlhuku.
Amwaatamana nkayoovacha chinene, ni mwaha uyo nkawaawanelha ilhapo yonkhaye yo miakoni Uyudea.
Kila ntu eewilhe nkaahalha oopuwelhaka munrimani ni ukoha, “Nohalha ukhalha chani yolha mwaana ulha?” Ukhalhawaya machiri a Athithi aari vachulhu vawe.
Azakariya nkayaachariya Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkayoolhumacha nttenga wa Nlhuku,
“Atotopelhiye Athithi, Nlhuku a attu o Israeli!
Honivaha Moopolhi o machiri unupani waya,
Aholhumacha toka ikatema yo machokholhelho wo iphiro ya anamilhohi awe atakatifu,
wiira anowa anoopolha wa amalhaponi ihu,
Aheera wiira anowoonelha ikiriri manyaapwiiya ihu
Ahaalheha apwiiya
anonoopolha wa amalhaponi ni univaha ntheko wa waakaviha wo uhoova,
wiira nkhalheke wo utakatifu mpangaka chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku,
Ni uwe mwanaka, unowa wiihaniya namilhohi a Nlhuku ri Mulhupalhe.
waahimeria attu aya wiira anowa woopolhiya
Nlhuku ihu ri o kiriri ni nrima woombone.
ni waamwalhelha nthuko attu onkhaye ari mwiipiphini mwo nookhwa,
Mwaana nkonnuwa, nkaachara machiri mwiiruttuni ni munnepani. Nkaakhalha uthakoni mpaka veechoninhe awe vaattuni wa attu o Israeli.
